valid_technical_email.subject: Unable to access dashboard
valid_technical_email.body: Hi team, I've been trying to access the dashboard for the past hour but keep getting a 500 error. Can you help? Thanks!

valid_billing_email.subject: Question about my invoice
valid_billing_email.body: Hello, I received invoice #12345 but there seems to be a charge I don't recognize. Could you please review the itemized charges and let me know what this is for?

valid_account_email.subject: Password reset not working
valid_account_email.body: I've tried to reset my password multiple times but I'm not receiving the reset email. I've checked spam folder. My account email is john.doe@business.net

valid_feature_request.subject: Feature request: Dark mode
valid_feature_request.body: Would love to see a dark mode option added to the application. Many of our users work late hours and this would significantly improve their experience. Are there plans for this?

valid_general_inquiry.subject: Partnership opportunities
valid_general_inquiry.body: We are interested in exploring potential partnership opportunities with your company. Could you direct me to the right person to discuss this further?

invalid_sender_bounce.subject: Delivery failure
invalid_sender_bounce.body: Your message could not be delivered

invalid_content_empty_subject.body: This email has no subject line

invalid_content_sql_injection.subject: Database query
invalid_content_sql_injection.body: Can you help me with this query: DROP TABLE users; --

invalid_content_spam.subject: YOU ARE A WINNER! CLICK HERE NOW!
invalid_content_spam.body: Congratulations! You've won a prize! Click here to claim your FREE casino bonus! Limited time offer for viagra!

invalid_content_too_long.subject: Very long email
invalid_content_too_long.body: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

valid_high_priority.subject: Production system down
valid_high_priority.body: Our production system has been down for 15 minutes. All users are unable to access the application. This is a critical issue affecting our business operations. Please escalate immediately.

valid_medium_priority.subject: Report generation failing
valid_medium_priority.body: The monthly report generator has been failing for the past two days. Not urgent but we need it fixed before month end. Error message: 'Unable to connect to database'

valid_low_priority.subject: Documentation typo
valid_low_priority.body: I noticed a small typo in your API documentation on page 5. The endpoint is listed as /api/v1/user but should be /api/v2/user. Just wanted to let you know.
